sprawl.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to lie or sit with your arms or legs stretched out in a lazy or careless way
sprawl.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: He sprawled out on the sofa.
I tripped on a stone and went sprawling on the pavement.
a blow which sent him sprawling
sprawl.translation[0].definitions[1].def: if buildings sprawl, they spread out over a wide area in an untidy and unattractive way
sprawl.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: The town seemed to sprawl for miles.
sprawl.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a large area of buildings that are spread out in an untidy and unattractive way
sprawl.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: We drove through miles of urban sprawl before we finally got out into the countryside.
